profile_positions.description: Yuelcollective is a combination of multi-medium artworks by yours truly. I am currently an apprentice level tattoo artist and create demand driven/sustainable/largely recycled clothing that supports local foster organizations as well. All digital content (graphic, photographic, video reels, etc) as well as web content is also created and managed by me as well
profile_positions.title: Tattoo / Multi Medium Artist

profile_positions.description:
Mavrck is the #1 influencer marketing platform for enterprise brands. We approach influencer marketing differently to activate all types of influencers across the customer experience journey to establish a ubiquitous journey of social proof - bringing results that cannot be achieved in other ways. 

As a Campaigns focused Custom Success Manager, I work with our CS, Services & Sales teams to execute timely thoughtful campaigns. We utilize data driven insights to help evolve our customers long and short term marketing strategies.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager, Campaigns

profile_positions.description:
Condé Nast serves as a global media company that produces some of the world's leading print, digital, video and social brands. 

As a Senior Media Solutions Specialist, I am responsible for supporting the lifecycle of Key Accounts.
profile_positions.title: Senior Media Solutions Specialist

profile_positions.description:
UNiDAYS is the world's leading Student Affinity Network with access to over 13 million college students around the world. We provide integrated, multi-channel campaigns and solutions to help reach students to help our clients connect with Gen Z all in one platform.

I owned day to day relationships and assist in the long term development of their most valuable partners, creating and executing omni-channel campaigns to deliver consistent upward growth.
profile_positions.title: Customer Success Manager

profile_positions.description:
Talking Rain focused largely on starting up influencer programming and on site events. As an assistant promoted full time from the Summer Internship Program, I assisted in launching not only the Kevin Durant x TR campaign but numerous digital campaigns as well. 
 
Team increased CGC by 37% and organic growth by 33% during 2016-2017
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Assistant

volunteer_experiences.description:
Instructor & Program Coordinator for 50+ collegiate students in international marketing presentation competition
2016/18/19 International Gold Medalist in the categories of: Advertising, Sales & International Marketing

company.name: Big Brothers Big Sisters of America

volunteer_experiences.description:
Created programming connecting collegiate students to BBBS children such as: College Tour/Counseling, Fitness Events, Speaker Panels, etc.
Raised over $60,000 for programs with the help of an incredible team

Mary's Place is a shelter that supports wonderful woman and children in several different areas that they need. I decided to connect my high school with this organization and ran clothing drives at the end of summer to help support families during the upcoming harsh Seattle Winter.
 
In 2015, we blew past our goal and collected 4200 items in less than 2 weeks.

Among the many amazing things YWCA does for the community, it also provides a safe haven and resources for woman and children fleeing from domestic abuse. 
I played a role in advising both woman and teens and volunteering at the shelter when needed.

I spent about 10 hours a week leading hands-on activities, heighten the experience of children and families by interacting with our visitors at the exhibits, assisted the staff in workshops, camps and birthday parties, and volunteer at special events such as farmers markets. 

I was then hired on as a part time Guest Experience Guide.

details.name: Kustomer
details.description: Kustomer helps businesses grow by delivering exceptional customer service via phone, email, chat, text, social, messaging and more. Kustomer enables fast, personalized, and efficient customer and agent experiences using complete customer visibility, seamless omnichannel conversations, intelligent automation and easy, no-code customization to adapt to change. See why growing brands use Kustomer to build the enduring customer relationships that drive better business results at http://ow.ly/UZ5X50HV0ov
